properties.description: Network Watcher is a regional service that enables you to monitor and diagnose conditions at a network scenario level in, to, and from Azure. Scenario level monitoring enables you to diagnose problems at an end to end network level view. It is required to have a network watcher resource group to be created in every region where a virtual network is present. An alert is enabled if a network watcher resource group is not available in a particular region.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

Specifies when the existence of the related resources should be evaluated. The delay is only used for evaluations that are a result of a create or update resource request. Allowed values are AfterProvisioning, AfterProvisioningSuccess, AfterProvisioningFailure, or an ISO 8601 duration between 0 and 360 minutes.
Name of the resource group of NetworkWatcher, such as NetworkWatcherRG. This is the resource group where the Network Watchers are located.
